plot_summary: A group of toys, headed by Woody, a pull-string cowboy doll, fear being replaced when a new action figure, Buzz Lightyear, comes into the picture. When they accidentally get lost, Woody and Buzz must work together to return to their owner, Andy, while overcoming their rivalry and learning the value of friendship.
writer: John Lasseter, Pete Docter, Andrew Stanton, Joe Ranft, Joss Whdeon, Joel Cohen, Alec Sokolow
main_characters: Woody, Buzz Lightyear, Andy, Mr. Potato Head, Rex, Hamm
main_voice_actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney

plot_summary: A misfit ant named Flik teams up with a group of circus bugs to save his colony from oppressive grasshoppers led by Hopper. Flik's ingenuity and bravery prove that even the smallest insect can stand up to the biggest bully when he places his trust in friends.
director: John Lasseter, co-directed by Andrew Stanton
writer: Andrew Stanton, Joe Ranft
main_characters: Flik, Princess Atta, Hopper, Dot, Manny, Gypsy
main_voice_actors: Dave Foley, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Kevin Spacey, Hayden Panettiere, Denis Leary

plot_summary: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and the rest of Andy’s toys set out on a daring rescue mission to save him, leading to an adventure that explores themes of loyalty and friendship.
director: John Lasseter, Ash Brannon, Lee Unkrich
writer: John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton, Pete Docter, Ash Brannon
main_characters: Woody, Buzz Lightyear, Jessie, Bullseye, Stinky Pete
main_voice_actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Kelsey Grammer

plot_summary: In a world where monsters generate energy by scaring children, top scarers Sulley and his assistant Mike discover that laughter is more powerful than fear after a child named Boo accidentally enters their world. They embark on an adventure to return her home while dealing with corporate greed and their own insecurities.
director: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich
writer: Pete Docter, Jill Culton, Jeff Pidgeon, Ralph Eggleston
main_characters: James P. Sullivan (Sulley), Mike Wazowski, Boo, Randall Boggs, Henry J. Waternoose III
main_voice_actors: John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi, James Coburn

plot_summary: A clownfish named Marlin embarks on a journey across the ocean to rescue his son, Nemo, who has been captured by a diver and placed in a fish tank. Along the way, he is joined by a regal blue tang named Dory, who suffers from short-term memory loss, leading to a series of comedic and adventurous encounters.
writer: Andrew Stanton, Bob Peterson, David Reynolds
main_characters: Marlin, Nemo, Dory, Gill, Crush
main_voice_actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Michael Myers

plot_summary: In a world where superheroes are forced to live undercover due to a government ban on superheroics, Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) struggles to live a mundane life. When an evil villain known as Syndrome threatens the world, Bob must come out of retirement with the help of his family—his wife Helen (Elastigirl) and their children Violet, Dash, and baby Jack-Jack—to save the day.
writer: Brad Bird
main_characters: Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl, Frozone, Violet Parr, Dash Parr, Jack-Jack Parr, Syndrome
main_voice_actors: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Samuel L. Jackson, Spencer Fox, Sarah Vowell, Jason Lee

plot_summary: Lightning McQueen, a hotshot race car, ends up in the small town of Radiator Springs after a mishap on the way to the Piston Cup championship. He learns the value of friendship, community, and humility through his interactions with the quirky residents of the town, including Sally, Mater, and Doc Hudson.
writer: John Lasseter, John Ranft, Jorgen Klubien, Dan Fogelman, Kiel Murray, Phil Lorin
main_characters: Lightning McQueen, Mater, Sally Carrera, Doc Hudson
main_voice_actors: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Bonnie Hunt, Paul Newman

plot_summary: Ratatouille tells the story of a young rat named Remy who dreams of becoming a chef in a restaurant in Paris. Despite his family's disapproval and the fact that he is a rat, Remy teams up with a hapless kitchen worker named Linguini to create culinary masterpieces, facing challenges from both human chefs and the restaurant critic Anton Ego along the way.
writer: Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava, Jim Capobianco
main_characters: Remy, Linguini, Colette, Anton Ego, Django
main_voice_actors: Brad Garrett, Patton Oswalt, Lou Romano, Janeane Garofalo, Peter O'Toole

plot_summary: In a future where Earth is abandoned and covered in garbage, a lonely waste-collecting robot named WALL-E embarks on a journey that ultimately decides the fate of mankind. When he meets a sleek robot named EVE, he discovers a new purpose and sets off on an adventure across the galaxy to restore life to Earth.
writer: Andrew Stanton, Jim Reardon
main_characters: WALL-E, EVE, M-O, Captain McCrea
main_voice_actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin

plot_summary: After the death of his beloved wife, an elderly widower named Carl Fredricksen fulfills their dream of visiting South America by tying thousands of balloons to his house and flying there. However, he unexpectedly finds himself accompanied by an earnest young boy named Russell, leading to an adventure that teaches them both about friendship, loss, and the importance of following dreams.
writer: Bob Peterson, Pete Docter, Tom McCarthy
main_characters: Carl Fredricksen, Russell, Dug, Kevin
main_voice_actors: Ed Asner, Jordan Nagai, john Ratzenberger

plot_summary: As Andy prepares to leave for college, Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and the rest of the toys find themselves accidentally thrown away and end up at a daycare center where they struggle to make sense of their new environment while trying to find their way back home.
writer: John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton, Lee Unkrich, Michael Arndt
main_characters: Woody, Buzz Lightyear, Jessie, Lotso, Andy
main_voice_actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty

plot_summary: Lightning McQueen and Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix, but Mater gets caught up in an international espionage adventure after he mistakenly becomes involved with a secret spy mission.
writer: John Lasseter, Brad Lewis, Dan Fogelman, Ben Queen
main_characters: Lightning McQueen, Mater, Francesco Bernoulli, Holly Shiftwell
main_voice_actors: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer

plot_summary: Set in medieval Scotland, 'Brave' follows the story of Merida, a headstrong princess who defies tradition and challenges fate by seeking to change her destiny. After a reckless choice leads to chaos, Merida must rely on her courage and archery skills to mend the bond with her mother and save her kingdom.
director: Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman, Steve Purcell
writer: Brenda Chapman, Mark Andrews, Steve Purcell
main_characters: Merida, Elinor, Mor'du, King Fergus
main_voice_actors: Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson, Billy Connolly, Julie Walters

plot_summary: Set before the events of 'Monsters, Inc.', 'Monsters University' follows the story of young Mike Wazowski and James P. 'Sulley' Sullivan as they attempt to become the top scarers at the university. Initially rivals, they learn the importance of friendship, teamwork, and believing in themselves throughout their comedic journey in college and the scare program.
writer: Dan Scanlon, Robert L. Baird, Daniel Gerson
main_characters: Mike Wazowski, James P. 'Sulley' Sullivan, Dean Hardscrabble, Randall Boggs
main_voice_actors: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Helen Mirren, Steve Buscemi

plot_summary: Inside Out takes us inside the mind of 11-year-old Riley, where five personified emotions—Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, and Disgust—navigate her emotional journey as she adjusts to a new life in San Francisco after moving from Minnesota.
writer: Pete Docter, Ronnie del Carmen, Meg LeFauve, Josh Cooley
main_characters: Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, Disgust
main_voice_actors: Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Bill Hader, Lewis Black, Mindy Kaling, Kaitlyn Dias

plot_summary: In a world where dinosaurs never went extinct, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely friend in a human boy named Spot. Together, they embark on an epic journey to reunite Arlo with his family, discovering their true strengths along the way.
writer: Bob Peterson, Peter Sohn, Erik Benson, Meg LeFauve, Kelsey Mann
main_characters: Arlo, Spot, Buck, Momma, Poppa, Forrest Woodbush
main_voice_actors: Raymond Ochoa, Jack Bright, Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Steve Zahn, Anna Paquin

plot_summary: Dory, a forgetful blue tang fish, sets out on a journey to find her long-lost parents. Along the way, she reunites with her friends Nemo and Marlin, and they navigate through challenges in the Marine Life Institute, where Dory encounters various sea creatures and learns about the importance of family and perseverance.
writer: Andrew Stanton, Victoria Strouse
main_characters: Dory, Marlin, Nemo, Hank, Destiny, Betty
main_voice_actors: Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks, Ed O'Neill, Kaitlyn Dias, Diane Keaton

plot_summary: In 'Cars 3', veteran race car Lightning McQueen faces a new generation of racers led by the sleek and savvy Jackson Storm. To prove he still has what it takes to be a champion, McQueen seeks the help of a young technician named Cruz Ramirez, who has her own dreams of racing. Together, they embark on a journey of self-discovery to achieve their goals and challenge the odds.
writer: Brian Fee, Ben Queen, Eyal Podell, Jonathon Stewart, Kiel Murray, Bob Peterson, Mike Rich
main_characters: Lightning McQueen, Cruz Ramirez, Jackson Storm, Mater
main_voice_actors: Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo, Armie Hammer, Larry the Cable Guy

plot_summary: Coco follows a young boy named Miguel who dreams of becoming a musician despite his family's ban on music. On the Day of the Dead, Miguel finds himself in the Land of the Dead and sets off on a journey to discover his family's history and the true meaning of family and remembrance.
writer: Lee Unkrich, Jason Katz, Adrian Molina
main_characters: Miguel Rivera, Hector, Mama Coco, Ernesto de la Cruz
main_voice_actors: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach

plot_summary: Incredibles 2 continues the story of the Parr family, who must balance life as superheroes with the challenges of everyday family life. After Elastigirl is called to lead a campaign to bring back superheroes, Mr. Incredible takes on the responsibilities of staying home with their children, all while facing a new villain, Screenslaver, who uses technology to control people's minds.
writer: Brad Bird
main_characters: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible), Helen Parr (Elastigirl), Violet Parr, Dash Parr, Jack-Jack Parr, Frozone, Screenslaver
main_voice_actors: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell, Samuel L. Jackson, Huck Milner

plot_summary: When Bonnie creates a new toy named Forky, Woody takes it upon himself to show Forky why he should embrace being a toy. The group embarks on an adventurous road trip that leads to a reunion with old friends and a test of the bond between Woody and Buzz Lightyear.
writer: John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton, Josh Cooley, Valerie LaPointe, Rashida Jones, Will McCormack, Martin Hynes, Stephany Folsom
main_characters: Woody, Buzz Lightyear, Forky, Bo Peep, Jessie
main_voice_actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Annie Potts, Tony Hale

plot_summary: In a suburban fantasy world, two teenage elf brothers, Ian and Barley Lightfoot, embark on a magical quest to spend one last day with their late father, utilizing a spell that brings him back for 24 hours. As they journey with their trusty van, they discover that magic is not as easy to wield as it seems, leading to hilarious misadventures and valuable lessons about family and the significance of their relationship.
writer: Dan Scanlon, Jason Headley, Keith Bunin
main_characters: Ian Lightfoot, Barley Lightfoot, Laurel Lightfoot, Wilden Lightfoot
main_voice_actors: Tom Holland, Chris Pratt, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Octavia Spencer

plot_summary: Joe Gardner, a middle school music teacher, has a near-death experience that leads him on an extraordinary adventure in the afterlife, where he discovers the true essence of passion and purpose in life.
writer: Pete Docter, Mike Jones, Kemp Powers
main_characters: Joe Gardner, 22, Moonwind, Terry, Dorothea Williams, Soul 22
main_voice_actors: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House, Alice Braga

plot_summary: Set in a beautiful seaside town on the Italian Riviera, 'Luca' follows a young sea monster named Luca Paguro who experiences a life-changing summer on land with his new human friend Alberto. Together, they indulge in gelato, pasta, and endless scooter rides while hiding their true identities from the townsfolk who harbor a deep-seated fear of sea monsters.
writer: Enrico Casarosa, Jesse Andrews, Simon Stephenson, Mike Jones
main_characters: Luca Paguro, Alberto Scorfano, Giulia Marcovaldo
main_voice_actors: Jacob Tremblay, Jack Dylan Grazer, Emma Berman

plot_summary: Turning Red is about a 13-year-old girl named Mei Lee who transforms into a giant red panda whenever she gets overly excited or stressed, navigating the challenges of adolescence while trying to deal with her mother's expectations and her newfound powers.
writer: Domee Shi, Julia Cho, Sarah Streicher
main_characters: Mei Lee, Ming Lee, Abby, Priya, and Tyler
main_voice_actors: Rosalie Chang, Sandra Oh, Ava Morse, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, Hiro Kanagawa

plot_summary: Lightyear is an origin story of Buzz Lightyear, the legendary Space Ranger, as he embarks on an intergalactic adventure to save his crew and the universe from a terrifying threat after being stranded on a hostile planet.
writer: Angus MacLane, Jason Headley, Matthew Aldrich
main_characters: Buzz Lightyear, Alisha Hawthorne, Zurg, Izzy Hawthorne, Mo Morrison
main_voice_actors: Chris Evans, Keke Palmer, Taika Waititi, Peter Sohn

plot_summary: In a city where fire, water, land, and air residents live together, a fierce fire element named Ember and a laid-back water element named Wade meet and discover their differing natures while forming an unexpected friendship that challenges their beliefs about their elemental differences.
writer: John Hoberg, Kat Likkel, Brenda Hsueh, Peter Sohn
main_characters: Ember Lumen, Wade Ripple
main_voice_actors: Leah Lewis, Mamoudou Athie

plot_summary: In 'Inside Out 2', Riley is now a teenager navigating the complicated emotions of adolescence. New emotions join the team within her mind, challenging the established dynamics, as they all must work together to help Riley cope with the ups and downs of growing up and forming new relationships.
writer: Meg LeFauve, Dave Holstein, Kelsey Mann
main_characters: Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, Disgust, and new characters like Ambition and Anxiety
main_voice_actors: Amy Poehler, Maya Hawke, Kensington Tallman, Ayo Edebiri, Phyllis Smith, Tony Hale
